title: People of the Netherlands
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Milan Herzog
brief_description: Reviews the history and growth of he Dutch poples; shows their efforts against the sea to secure land enough to support their dense population; and discusses factors influencing the position of the Netherlands among other nations in industry and trade.
description: Reviews the history and growth of he Dutch poples; shows their efforts against the sea to secure land enough to support their dense population; and discusses factors influencing the position of the Netherlands among other nations in industry and trade.
